data.expected_result: Either the server action sheet pops up (like it does when you long press on the server icon on the main qs page) or the QS closes and you land in the last channel in the selected server.
data.short_description: When you long press on a server after using the server filter in the quick switcher, you are redirected to the server but the QS doesn't close.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open QS and type in an asterisk. Long press on any server.
